message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I get $60, you get $40.  A fair start, don't you think?
Let's try a bit more balanced split, shall we?
Bob, time is literally money! Let's not drag this out. I'll take slightly less than last time - $55 - and you get $45. It's a good deal considering the inflation.
We're both losing to inflation... Meet me in the middle?
